string.text: Clear area of mutants
Mutants are about. Hunt them down and clear the area.
Shh... Listen, hear that? Some mutants howling. Still gives me the chills after all this time. How about you go out there and take care of them? I'll make it worth your while.
Haha! Well done stalker! Have a drink on Beard!
Find the "%s" artefact
Beard wants you to find the "%s" artefact for him.
I deal in artefacts. I usually don't buy them from stalkers, but there is one in particular I would like to get my hands on. Do you want to try to get it for me?
I'm looking for the %s artefact. You ever seen one? If you can find it I will pay you well.
Good hunting stalker! Have a drink on the house!
Diplomat
Convince the military commander to call off his search for a fellow stalker.

You see that guy in the corner there? Spetsnaz is looking for him. He's been hiding out here for weeks. They say he ran through the Brain Scorcher to escape them. I don't know how he survived, though he ain't quite right in the head any-more. Anyway, you want to help the poor fellow? I happen to know where the military commander who wants him is stationed. Maybe you can convince him to leave the guy alone.
Ah, you killed him! Well, that's effective diplomacy! Good man! Free drinks for you!
Find "%s"
%s are required by Cardan to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Not only do I need some more booze I can really use a good set of tools, stalker. If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I need.
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great, stalker. You brought exactly what I've asked. Thanks.
Find "%s"
%s are required by Cardan to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I could really use more tools and vodka. But the vodka is easy to find. What I need from you is more tools; better tools. Can you do this for me?
I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Fantastic! Feel free to stop by any time for a drink or if you need me to take a look at your gear.
